name: Fruit World: Game Pop Match3
description:
Switch and match fruits complete the goal in the specified steps or times. Enjoy the full juice adventure for free!
Through the fruit city to enjoy delicious juice.
How to play:
- Match 3 or more fruits clear fruits.
- Clean the fruits when fruits top of cookies destroy it.
- You need to complete the goal in the specified steps or times.
- Match 4 fruits can win the lightning fruits.
- Match 5 fruits in cross pattern to generate a super lightning fruit.
- Match 5 fruits horizontally or vertically to generate juice fruit.
- Combine power ups for a more powerful explosion!
